subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: Teams looking to fill vacancies can turn to a new listing of top coach and general manager candidates that was compiled by a league panel that included Tony Dungy and John Madden.
snippet: Teams looking to fill vacancies can turn to a new listing of top coach and general manager candidates that was compiled by a league panel that included Tony Dungy and John Madden.
